General.Name: Dr Peng Telecom and Media Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Dr. Peng Telecom & Media Group Co., Ltd. engages in smart cloud network, home broadband and value-added, data center, industrial Internet, and digital economy industrial park businesses. The company offers digital wisdom cloud services which includes fusion cloud, dedicated cloud, cloud network integration, as well as provides pengyun SaaS CRM, database, cloud disaster recovery, cloud migration, and dunyun, and other insurance products. It also offers intelligent network services, including pengyun SD-WAN, DCI, enterprise network, and CDN services. In addition, the company provides data centers, and related services. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Dr. Peng Telecom & Media Group Co., Ltd. Dr. Peng Telecom & Media Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Qingdao, China.
